item.title: Nix quickstart guide
item.description: This guide helps you start quickly with using Nix as a package manager. This guide covers setting up, nix-shell, nix-env -iA, and Home Manager. Here’s a quick way to get started with using Nix as a package manager without diving into the complex internals: Install Nix with sh <(curl -L https://nixos.org/nix/install) --daemon. Make sure to add that snippet at the end to your shell configuration or you’ll have some trouble later.
